name: Submaracers
description:
I made this game by myself over a semester for my final year in a Bachelor of Games Design course at RMIT University. I created all the art assets myself and coded most of it as a beginner programmer.

It is inspired by other Indie Games including SpeedRunners and Runbow.

Obviously there will be some little flaws here and there due to my inexperience. Please let me know if you find any that really should be fixed.

Enjoy playing Submaracers with friends! Comments and feedback is highly appreciated. Thanks!
